name: Tella
headline: The screen recorder that edits videos for you.

Working on Tella;
Async video communication for remote teams. Create engaging stories for your ideas and updates.

generated_description:
### Tella: Your Go-To Screen Recording Solution

Tella, founded in 2020 and part of the Y Combinator S20 batch, is revolutionizing the way we create videos. Based in Amsterdam, this lean team of six is on a mission: “The screen recorder that edits videos for you.” And they mean it.

#### What Is Tella?

At its core, Tella is a screen recording tool that takes the pain out of video creation. It combines the capabilities of traditional screen recorders with intuitive editing features—even automating the editing process with AI. Imagine recording product demos, tutorials, or any video effortlessly, without needing to fiddle around with complex editing software for hours. That’s the Tella promise. 

#### Features That Stand Out

- **Manageable Clips**: Record in bite-sized clips rather than long takes. This helps keep your content organized and easier to digest.
- **Speaker Notes**: Never lose track of what you want to say. Write your notes right in the app to stay focused.
- **Cross-Platform Capability**: Use it on both Mac and PC seamlessly, thanks to its browser-based options.
- **Effortless Editing**: With Tella, you can trim silences, remove filler words like "um," and even edit the video as if it were a text document. The AI features mean you're not scrubbing through endless footage any longer—just cut to the good stuff with a click.
- **Dynamic Publishing Options**: Share your videos instantly online with customizable links or download them in 4K for that extra polish. 

#### Real Users, Real Impact

Entrepreneurs and creators alike are raving about Tella. Users have shared their experience switching from platforms like Loom, noting Tella's user-friendliness and professional output. One user noted that their content creation speed accelerated thanks to the platform, while another praised its customization options for product demos. 

#### Cost and Getting Started

Tella offers a **7-day free trial** with no credit card needed, making it easy to test it out. You’ll find it not just an investment in tools, but an investment in time saved and production quality.

To dive in and see why Tella is making waves in the SaaS landscape, visit [Tella.tv](https://tella.tv). Whether you're a content creator, educator, or just someone looking to share ideas more visually, Tella provides the tools to help you grow your video presence without the usual hurdles. 

---

In short, if you’re looking for a straightforward, effective tool to enhance your video creation process, Tella is a strong contender. It’s designed for those who want to focus on their message rather than the mechanics of video production.
